pkgmetadata.longdescription: # irisml-tasks-transformersThis is a MLTest task package for Huggingface's transformers package.For the detail of IrisML framework, visit [irisml repository](https://github.com/microsoft/irisml)# Tasks## create_transformers_modelCreate a model using transformers library. Currently only CLIPModel is supported.```pythonclass Config: name: str pretrained: bool = Falseclass Outputs: model: torch.nn.Module```## create_transformers_tokenizerCreate a tokenizer using transformers library.```pythonclass Config: name: strclass Outputs: tokenizer: typing.Callable```
